meanings.definition: Gopiks: a group of milkmaids who were devoted followers of the Hindu god Krishna.
meanings.sent1: The gopiks danced joyfully around Krishna.
meanings.sent2: The gopiks brought milk to Krishna every morning.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous gopiks played a prank on Krishna by hiding his flute.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the gopiks symbolize unwavering devotion.
meanings.sent5: The colorful saris of the gopiks brightened the village streets.
